title: Newsletter Platform
shortDescription: A scalable newsletter system delivering engaging content to subscribers.
description: Built a comprehensive newsletter platform using React and Node.js that manages subscriber engagement and content delivery. The platform features automated email campaigns, subscriber management, analytics dashboard, and content scheduling. Implemented responsive design for optimal reading experience across all devices.

objectives: Create a scalable newsletter management system

teamContributions: Alex Chen: Led backend architecture and email delivery system
Sarah Rodriguez: Designed user interface and email templates
Marcus Johnson: Implemented database optimization and analytics
Elena Petrov: Built subscriber management and automation features

about.architecture: React frontend with Node.js backend, MongoDB for subscriber data, EmailJS for delivery, and AWS for hosting and scaling.
about.caseStudy: This project was our foundation as BachEnd, starting as a newsletter organization. The biggest challenge was ensuring reliable email delivery while maintaining subscriber engagement. We solved this through careful template design and deliverability optimization. This project taught us the importance of user experience in content delivery.
lessonsLearned: Email deliverability requires careful technical considerations
User engagement metrics are crucial for content strategy
Scalable architecture is essential for growing subscriber bases
Content design significantly impacts user experience
